title: Flux Esc LF (Coach/Analyst)
body:
Hi i'm the manager for FLux eSports Club a recently formed OOL team that is in need of a coach for the upcoming OOL split.

We have a very talented roster consisting of Challenger players (Roster will be provided upon request). We are very confident in our ability to do well in the upcoming split however we feel as though now we need some expert opinion and guidance. If that seems like you than let me know.

Requirements:
- Relatively free schedule (Mon, Wed and Fri nights)
- Positive attitude
- Past coaching experience (Preff)
- High Elo (Preff)

Payment may potentially be an option if you are able to show that you will be a great benefit to us.
Other details can be discussed with me in game
Add: Flux Joebro
Or the Owner: Ciphor

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

replies.body: Hey my dude if you're still interested add me in game under Hammar97
